Description: Postcard; printed; photograph showing a seated young Arab woman in local dress, Egypt.
Producer name: Published by: The Cairo Postcard Trust
Curator's comments: Old card; postally used; postmarked Cairo, 19th December 1912. The somewhat ungrammatical message reads: "Dear E., You saw the donkey try this is a Arab girls how would you like to dress. Like this wishing you a merry Xmas. from Auntie & Uncle".
